data.enText: that is true and cannot be disagreed with or denied
data.chText: 不容置疑的；无可争辩的；不容否认的

data.enText: It is indisputable that the crime rate has been rising.
data.chText: 毫无疑问，犯罪率一直在上升。

data.enText: This painting is indisputably one of his finest works.
data.chText: 这幅画无疑是他最好的作品之一。

example.ex: It is indisputable that birds in the UK are harbouring this illness...
example.tran: 无可争辩的是,英国的鸟类携带着这种疾病的病菌。

example.ex: The indisputable fact is that computers carry out logical operations.
example.tran: 不容置疑的事实是，电脑执行逻辑操作指令。

value.def: If you say that something is indisputable, you are emphasizing that it is true and cannot be shown to be untrue.
value.tran: 无可争辩的;不容置疑的

example.ex: She has an indisputably lovely voice.
example.tran: 毫无疑问，她的声音很好听。
